item.title: Daily Hacker News for 2023-10-10
item.content:encoded:
关键词: Hacker News, pivot table, Medieval staircases, DSLinux, ECC RAM

总结: 2023年10月10日，《Hacker News》上评分最高的10篇文章中，没有出现在之前的《Hacker News Daily》中的文章包括：1. 《The pivot table, the spreadsheet's most powerful tool (2020)》介绍了数据透视表的强大功能；2. 《Medieval staircases were not built going clockwise for the defender's advantage》揭示了中世纪楼梯的设计原理；3. 《DSLinux – Linux for the Nintendo DS》介绍了适用于任天堂DS的Linux系统；4. 《ECC RAM on AMD Ryzen 7000 Desktop CPUs》讨论了AMD Ryzen 7000台式机处理器上的ECC RAM；这些文章涵盖了不同领域的内容，包括电子表格、中世纪建筑、嵌入式系统和计算机硬件。

The 10 highest-rated articles on Hacker News on October 10, 2023 which have not appeared on any previous Hacker News Daily are:

  • The pivot table, the spreadsheet's most powerful tool (2020)
    (comments)
  • Medieval staircases were not built going clockwise for the defender's advantage
    (comments)
  • DSLinux – Linux for the Nintendo DS
    (comments)
  • ECC RAM on AMD Ryzen 7000 Desktop CPUs
    (comments)
  • Firefox tooltip bug fixed after 22 years
    (comments)
  • Fair coins tend to land on the same side they started
    (comments)
  • The novel HTTP/2 'Rapid Reset' DDoS attack
    (comments)
  • The largest DDoS attack to date, peaking above 398M rps
    (comments)
  • Valve says Counter-Strike 2 for macOS not happening, there aren't enough players
    (comments)
  • Oil sector is lobbying for inefficient hydrogen cars to delay electrification
    (comments)
